class.name: AudioSpatializerInstanceEffect
class.brief_description: Audio Spatializer Instance that can use [AudioEffect]s.
class.description: Audio Spatializer Instance that can use [AudioEffect]s. Needs to be extended to implement [method AudioSpatializerInstance._calculate_spatialization]. Takes care of the audio stream processing and mixing, so you do not need to implement [method AudioSpatializerInstance._process_frames], [method AudioSpatializerInstance._should_process_frames], [method AudioSpatializerInstance._mix_channel], or [method AudioSpatializerInstance._should_mix_channels]. You can implement [method _instantiate_playback_data], but it should return a subclass of [SpatializerPlaybackDataEffect]. Since the audio mixing is handled, this class is ideal for making [AudioSpatializer] implementations with GDScript or C#.

method.name: _process_effects
method.description: Method to update [AudioEffect] parameters per frame. Called as part of [method AudioSpatializerInstance._process_frame] before the [AudioEffect] array is used to process the audio stream.

members.member: Array of [AudioEffect]s that are used to process the audio stream during mixing. Populated by the parent [AudioSpatializerEffect] during instantiation.
